reviewText: Everybody Loves Raymond, is my fave....... Always makes me laugh, AND that is a very GOOD thing... You know the old saying: LAUGHTER IS THE BEST MEDICINE~~~~~
Title: Everybody Loves Raymond Seasons 5 and 6

reviewText: These DVDs are awesome it just that the first few seasons are done a bit low quality so on my 47" TV I have to set the format to justified or zoom to get a full screen. The later seasons are done much better quality, it's kinda odd.
Title: Everybody Loves Raymond Seasons 5 and 6

reviewText: Like to watch reruns, so this way I can watch when ever I want.  Don't no why I never watched when it was first on.  I do that sometimes.
Title: Everybody Loves Raymond Seasons 5 and 6

reviewText: I love the Everybody Love Raymond series, I think they are really funny, so if you collect comedy then this is a good set to get
Title: Everybody Loves Raymond Seasons 5 and 6

reviewText: Have long been fans of this show, and now we are able to see this very crazy and goofy family any time we want.  Good family entertainment, that you can truly sit and watch with your children and grand children.
Title: Everybody Loves Raymond Seasons 5 and 6

reviewText: I sure do like this show..and the dvd quality is fine..i also find it is like my real family , as i guess most ppl do , and that is why it was so popular. I like each character , and they do make me laugh , and i believe that is what the show is supposed to do. It is good pretty clean fun , and i don't have to worry bout turning it off by something i find tasteless.I think this show is one that anybody can relate to , one way or another.
Title: Everybody Loves Raymond Seasons 5 and 6
